item.title: About me
item.author: gopalakrishnan.shanker@gmail.com (Gopalakrishnan Shanker Rajhan)
item.description: My name is Gopalakrishnan Shanker Rajhan. If that’s too complex for you (and it mostly is) I prefer you call me Krishna. What else do you need? I grew up in the beautiful coastal city of Chennai, in India. I studied Mechanical Engineering for my undergraduate degree and followed that up with a Master’s in Statistics at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. This website is inspired by what I thought about and learnt during my master’s.
